definition: see 作戰失蹤人員|作战失踪人员[zuo4 zhan4 shi1 zong1 ren2 yuan2]

pinyin: zuo4 zhan4 shi1 zong1 ren2 yuan2

sentences.english: The missing sailors are two men aged 30 and 52.
sentences.chinese: 失踪的两名船员为30岁和52岁男子。

sentences.english: Before Mei filed her complaint about Hong to her husband, Hong disappeared suddenly.
sentences.chinese: 还没等梅婧向叶城告状，洪小玲却突然失踪了。

sentences.english: Max enlisted the help of his neighbors to find his missing dog.
sentences.chinese: 麦斯寻求邻居协助他寻找失踪的狗儿。

sentences.english: What we saw was a search without a conclusion, a disappearance without a solution.
sentences.chinese: 我们看到的是一场无果的搜寻，一次无解的失踪。

sentences.english: Three goats belonging to local farmers are still missing.
sentences.chinese: 当地农民的另外三只羊也失踪了。

sentences.english: At least 39 people were killed and 31 are still missing.
sentences.chinese: 至少有39人死亡，31人依然失踪。

sentences.english: AZe Jackie since back, the whole portrait missing changed a similar.
sentences.chinese: 呵责杰姬自从失踪回来后，整个人像变了一个似的。

sentences.english: I want to know the history of his disappearance.
sentences.chinese: 我要知道他失踪前前后后的情况。

sentences.english: A few who run shops have turned their storefronts into missing person displays.
sentences.chinese: 有些开店的人干脆把门面改成了失踪人口展览。

sentences.english: In the Unite States, Bloodhounds help find missing people.
sentences.chinese: 在美国，侦探犬有助于搜索失踪者。

sentences.english: The search party found the lost person.
sentences.chinese: 搜索队发现了失踪的人。

sentences.english: One pilot injured, one missing after aircraft plummets at NW China air show.
sentences.chinese: 西北飞豹战机表演时坠毁飞行员一生一失踪。

sentences.english: Dozens of people are still missing.
sentences.chinese: 目前仍然有几十个人失踪。

sentences.english: Rescue workers search for missing people among the debris in Gojo, Nara Prefecture.
sentences.chinese: 在奈良县五条，救援人员在残骸中寻找失踪人员。

sentences.english: They'll simply assume that, pathetically, you've never been able to quit.
sentences.chinese: 可惜的是，他们只会认为，你从未能把烟戒失踪。

definition: to have an accident/to meet with a mishap
to vanish/to disappear from the face of the earth
(of a plane, ship etc) to have an accident (plane crash, shipwreck, vehicle collision etc)/to mess things up
